messages.subject: GOOD church music karaoke site
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.missionstclare.com/music/music.html A friend just sent this to me.  It has little to do with anything, except I have always loved religious music
messages.messageBody:
http://www.missionstclare.com/music/music.html


A friend just sent this to me. It has little to do with anything, except I
have always loved religious music and this has some particularly good stuff.
It has more than one kind of MIDI thing on some, and the words are there,
and the versions are long enough to sing four verses WITH an intro and it has
Dona Nobis Pacem (an old round) and lots of music stuff. It's really
wonderful and has four part harmonies...

Wowie. Even if you're not into church music, there will be some stuff there
you might like. In the Christmas section they have some things which are
traditional and have only become well known in the past few decades. Newish
two or three hundred year old songs. <g>

It has "Be Thou My Vision," one of the best songs ever.

Though the site seems liturgically Catholic, the music is mixed, and there's
a fair amount of it!



Do the links ever work for anybody? Like this one:<A
HREF="http://www.missionstclare.com/music/music.html">Music</A> ?


Sandra
